ygData.msgSnippet: well, for this you have , RTS, Ogre War Maul, Bloodforge Hammer, Observers Staff*I believe is 2H*. Anything else is just useless for higher lvl

well, for this you have , RTS, Ogre War Maul, Bloodforge Hammer, Observers Staff*I believe is 2H*.
Anything else is just useless for higher lvl characters......
